mil.emp3.api.events

Class CameraEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.events.Event<CameraEventEnum,ICamera>
      • mil.emp3.api.events.CameraEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEvent<CameraEventEnum,ICamera>

    public abstract class CameraEvent
extends Event<CameraEventEnum,ICamera>
    This abstract class implements a camera event. It is generated when a camera is associated with a map and the map's view changes.

      This protected constructor is for internal use only.

        public boolean isAnimate()
